parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post mentions Calin Georgescu and Lasconi, implicitly referencing the parliamentary elections. While not explicitly naming them as candidates, the context strongly suggests they are competing in the elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The content is not a private message but a public statement.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's core message alleges that PSD instructed mayors to vote for Calin Georgescu to prevent Lasconi from winning. This directly aims to influence voters' choices in the election, even if indirectly by suggesting manipulation.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While presented as a news item, the post lacks journalistic objectivity. It presents an unsubstantiated claim with a clear bias against PSD and in favor of (implicitly) Lasconi.  It does not provide evidence or sources to support the allegation.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not a personal opinion; it's presented as a factual report, even if it is not. The language used ("Planul PSD era...", "Vor reface alegerile...") suggests an attempt to present the information as factual and influence public opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1294526935229404</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while disguised as a news report, functions as electoral propaganda. It targets the parliamentary elections by mentioning specific candidates (Calin Georgescu and Lasconi) and alleges actions by the PSD party intended to influence the election outcome. The post lacks journalistic objectivity and presents unsubstantiated claims to sway public opinion. The paid nature of the post, targeting a wide audience, further strengthens its classification as electoral propaganda.  The post's objective is clearly to influence voters' choices, even if it does so by suggesting manipulation within the PSD.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Calin Georgescu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Lasconi</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Fruncea, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1294526935229404) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care, deși mascată ca o știre, constituie propagandă electorală. Postarea menționează candidații Calin Georgescu și Lasconi, insinuând acțiuni ale PSD menite să influențeze rezultatul alegerilor. Lipsa obiectivității jurnalistice și afirmațiile nefondate, prezentate ca fapte, au scopul clar de a influența alegătorii.  Plata postării, vizând o audiență largă, consolidează caracterul de propagandă electorală.  Afirmațiile precum „Planul PSD era...” și „Vor reface alegerile...” sunt menite să influențeze votul, sugerând manipulare în interiorul PSD.  Postarea a generat între 10.000 și 15.000 de impresii, cu o estimare a acoperirii de peste 1 milion de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Contactul advertiserului este fulgeralbastru99@gmail.com și +40747768451, cu adresa în Timișoara, Timiș. Suma cheltuită pentru publicitate se situează între 100 și 199 RON.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
